page.title: 14A Day of Education
page.content: Here is a typical day at{Riverside {Junior School,}which caters for 7 to 11 year olds. After registration we go down to assembly.{Assembly}is where all the children gather in the hall to sing hymns and have a story and a prayer. After assembly we do{mathematics. Mathematics is the world of numbers which includes calculations, angles, shapes and degrees. After mathematics we have a break. Then we watch a {television programme}which is called Middle English. This programme helps us to develop new skills in{English {Grammar}and also tells use stories, news, reports, etc.{Dinner break}is at twelve noon. After dinner we do{art & {craft.}This is where you draw and paint pictures. Then we have play. Then we carry on with art and craft until home time. We then do P.E.
